    • register

      public boolean register​(@NotNull @NotNull Course course, @NotNull @NotNull Student student) throws StudentCreditsOverflowException, MaxEnrollmentCourseException, SQLException
      register a student to a course
      Parameters:
      course - , must not be null
      student - , must not be null
      Returns:
      true if student was registered to specified course, false if course has no more free places
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error when handling the database
      StudentCreditsOverflowException - Can't register to this course, because the limit of the student credits is exceeded(>30)
      MaxEnrollmentCourseException - Can't register to this course, because there are no more free places

      Throws:

    • changeCredits

      public void changeCredits​(@NotNull @NotNull Course course, int credits) throws StudentCreditsOverflowException, SQLException
      this method changes the number of credits of a course
      Parameters:
      course - the course, which details will be changed
      credits - the new number of credits
      Throws:
      StudentCreditsOverflowException - Can't change, because students enrolled to this course would exceed their limit
      SQLException - Error when handling the database
